DOC.brief_summary: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) chronic respiratory condition deteriorate lung function year . Patients COPD experience symptom shortness breath , cough sputum production . This study assess treatment effect inhalation three different single dos AZD9164 ( 100 , 400 1200 mcg ) one single dose tiotropium ( 18 mcg ) . One dose placebo give comparator . 25 patient participate study recruit Sweden . Each patient visit study doctor 9 time study , whereof 5 visit overnight visit . All examination , treatment follow-up free charge .
DOC.brief_title: The Study Will Evaluate Effect AZD9164 Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: A clinical diagnosis COPD FEV1 40 80 % predict normal value ( postbronchodilator ) post bronchodilator FEV1/FVC < 70 % Any clinically relevant abnormal finding screen examination Any clinically significant disease disorder
